articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 7 and Mi 9 Lite grab MIUI 12.5 globally, Mi 9 receives new OS in Europe - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: MIUI 12.5 has arrived on the Redmi Note 7, Mi 9 Lite and Mi 9 in more regions. The OS update does not bring Android 11 to the Redmi Note 7 though, unfortunately.
articles.content: MIUI 12.5 has reached another three devices in more regions. According to a company blog post, Xiaomi has started issuing its latest OS to the Mi 9 Lite and the Redmi Note 7 on its global MIUI branch… [+952 chars]

articles.title: Fossil reveals burrowing lifestyle of tiny dino, Europe News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
articles.description: PARIS (AFP) - A finger-sized fossil from 308 million years ago unearthed in the United States gives tantalising clues to the habits of tiny dinosaur-like creatures that may be the forerunners of reptiles, researchers revealed Wednesday (July 21).. Read more a…

articles.title: The world's road fuel demand to peak four years earlier than expected - Mint
articles.description: The European Union last week unveiled an ambition climate plan that would ban new combustion-engine cars by 2035, while countries including China and the U.S. have been pushing for greater adoption of electric vehicles
articles.content: Demand for gasoline and diesel to fuel cars and trucks will peak in 2027 -- four years earlier than expected -- as more fuel-efficient autos and increasing adoption of electric vehicles curb global c… [+2281 chars]
